product_name: Pacsafe VentureSafe 65L GII Travel Pack - 2014 Closeout
long_description: With specialized fabric that protects from slash-and-run thefts, the VentureSafe 65L GII Travel Pack lets you see the world without having to keep an eye on the gear in your pack.
